name: BlockChain Signals 00 - GM (Good Morning)
description:
BlockChain Signals are a collection of phrases common in our community that have been translated from an ASCII string into an audio file using OsciStudio Livecoding techniques represented as an x,y signal played through an oscilloscope emulator. The result is visually depicted while listening to the audio signal source to juxtapose the digitization of the human experience and consider the abstraction of data into art.

This one was inspired by the thought can this sound good at all? it is Music for Robots after all
